message:
SYSTEM: ATHENS_Terminology_in_ontologies_15-11-2010.pdf: Página 4
4
Terminology in technical & scientific domains
• No professional communication can exist without 
terminology
• No knowledge transfer can exist without terminology
• Without terminology there is not
–Intelectual and material development
–Professional research and training
• As a consequence, 
–no further development would take place 
–A country would isolate from the rest of developed 
countries
(Picht, 1979)
speaker: SYSTEM
